org.libav

Class DefaultMediaReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.DefaultMediaReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediaReader

    public class DefaultMediaReader
extends Object
implements IMediaReader
    Default implementation of the media reader interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultMediaReader(String url)
      Open the given media URL using the default media reader.

        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while opening the media

      • readNextPacket

        public boolean readNextPacket()
                       throws LibavException
        Description copied from interface: IMediaReader
        Read a next packet from the media stream and send it immediately to all packet consumers for the corresponding stream.
        Specified by:
        readNextPacket in interface IMediaReader
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • readNextPacket

        public boolean readNextPacket(int streamIndex)
                       throws LibavException
        Description copied from interface: IMediaReader
        Check whether there is a packet with the given stream index in the buffer and send it to all its consumers. If there is no such packet in the buffer read a next packet and check its stream index. If it is same as the given stream index send it, otherwise put it into the corresponding buffer.
        Specified by:
        readNextPacket in interface IMediaReader
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream index
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

        Specified by:
        readNextVideoPacket in interface IMediaReader
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

                             boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: IMediaReader

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream index
        enabled - true to enable it, false to disable it
